item.g:title: Black Mud Soap
item.g:description: <p><span>This luxurious soap cleanses and nourishes the skin, infusing it with revitalizing Dead Sea Minerals and restoring the skin’s pH balance for maximum benefits.  Dead Sea Mud, combined with Glycerin, works to remove impurities without stripping moisture from the skin.</span></p>

item.g:title: Body Mud Mask
item.g:description: An extraordinary Dead Sea Body Mud Mask which comes to you from the Dead Sea - rich with precious minerals that help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles caused by aging and fatigue. Absorbs excess oils, sweeps away dead skin cells and nourishes the skin. Leaving it rejuvenated and hydrated. Revitalizing minerals such as Magnesium, Potassium and Calcium encourage a localized warming action to invigorate the body and ease muscular tension. Impurities are removed and skin is reborn. A new fresh layer of skin emerges revealing a healthy glowing body.

item.g:title: Creamud Facial Mask
item.g:description: This extraordinary mask is specifically formulated with Aloe Vera which moistens and repairs elasticity for dry and sensitive skin. It is enriched with the anti-oxidant Vitamin E and other precious minerals such as magnesium, potassium, calcium and other that  help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles caused by aging, fatigue and the environment. Its deep penetrating action removes impurities, excess oil, dead cells while it nourishes the skin, leaving it soft and hydrated. A new, fresh layer of skin emerges, revealing a healthy, radiant  complexion.

item.g:title: Day Cream SPF15
item.g:description: A restorative day cream utilizing Dead Sea minerals, Aloe Vera extract, Vitamin E and active sunscreen agents to provide your skin with an enhancing balance of moisture and nourishment, helping to prevent premature skin damage as a result of harmful UVA and UVB sun exposure. Promotes a more youthful and revitalized complexion.

item.g:title: Day Cream SPF15
item.g:description: This rich Day Cream, formulated with protective emollients and revitalizing Dead Sea minerals, is designed specifically for Dry and Sensitive skin.  This unique blend of oils and sunscreen filters forms a barrier that protects the skin from redness or dryness caused by harmful environmental factors and direct sun light exposure.  Regular use of this Day Cream strengthens the skin and delays the effects of aging.  Your skin remains smooth, soft, and healthy.

item.g:title: Emollient Hand cream
item.g:description: Intensive humectants combined with Shea Butterand revitalizing Dead Sea Minerals to help reduce excessive perspiration and skin roughness due to external aggressions while restores skin firmness, moisture and elasticity.Leaves your hands smooth, supple with silky touch.

item.g:title: Day Cream SPF15
item.g:description: A restorative day cream utilizing Dead Sea minerals, Aloe Vera extract, Vitamin E and active sunscreen agents to provide your skin with an enhancing balance of moisture and nourishment, helping to prevent premature skin damage as a result of harmful UVA and UVB sun exposure. Promotes a more youthful and revitalized complexion.

item.g:title: Dead Sea Concentrated Water
item.g:description: Rivage selected carefully the highest magnesium concentration Dead Sea water to help relieve the irritation and itching caused by skin complaints and disorders, such as eczema, psoriasis and acne, as well as stimulating blood circulation and cell regeneration, leaving skin supremely soft, velvet and recognized for imparting a relaxed feeling with activating circulatory system for easing rheumatic discomfort.

item.g:title: Essential Care
item.g:description:
List of products
- Facial Mud Mask 120 ml
- Black Mud Soap 100 g
- Emolliant Hand Cream 100 ml
- Natural Salt 250 g

item.g:title: Exfoliant Soap
item.g:description: This luxurious soap bar gently exfoliates and moisturizes the skin using a combination of natural active ingredients. Walnut shell granules remove dead cells and polish the surface of the skin while Dead Sea Minerals penetrate and revitalize the skin. Moisturizing elements seal in moisture, giving your skin the protection it needs.

item.g:title: Eye Cream
item.g:description: Rivage Eye Cream is a revolutionary treatment product that helps reduce puffiness and dark circles and eliminate fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes. It contains the moisturizing benefits of Jojoba Oil, Avocado Oil and Dead Sea Minerals to help revitalize the elasticity of skin surrounding the eyes, and Beech Tree Bud Extract helps eliminate wrinkles and signs of premature aging.  A special mineral foundation is added to conceal dark circles or uneven skin tone.

item.g:title: Eye Wrinkle Gel
item.g:description: Rivage Eye Wrinkle Gel is specifically formulated to provide the delicate skin around eyes with intensive care.  This smooth gel penetrates the skin to reduce fine lines and deep wrinkles while moisturizing and soothing the skin to eliminate puffiness and dark circles.  This natural complex gel contains the following beneficial ingredients:  beech tree bud extracts, an anti-aging agent; Dead Sea Minerals, provitamin B5 (panthenol) and natural monosaccharide, which retains the skin’s moisture balance; and marine collagen, which increases elasticity of the skin. This light gel is easily absorbed into the skin, resulting in healthier, younger looking skin.

item.g:title: Facial Exfoliant Cream
item.g:description: <p><span>Facial Exfoliant Cream with walnut shell granules unblocks pores to reveal fresh, new skin. These unique micro-refined walnut shell granules gently exfoliates, polishes and moisturizes the skin with a combination of pure olive oil, avocado oil and Dead Sea minerals. The skin’s complexion is rejuvenated, radiant and extraordinarily soft.</span></p>

item.g:title: Facial Moisturizing Cream
item.g:description:
Rivage Facial Moisturizing Cream with Vegetable Collagen helps eliminate the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while providing hours of hydrating coverage. This remarkable formula combined with Vitamin E, Pro-Vitamin B5, Dead Sea Minerals and Aloe Vera to protect and replenish the skin’s elasticity and natural moisture balance, while maintaining the skin’s natural tone and smoothness.

recommended for maskne.

item.g:title: Facial Mud Mask (Pouch)-500g
item.g:description: Purifying Dead Sea facial mud mask formulated to firm and boost cell renewal while hydrates and rejuvenates dull skin by lifting impurities and gently pulling out toxins from the skin. Leaves your skin fresh, supple with healthy looking complexion.

item.g:title: Facial Mud Mask (Pouch)-200g
item.g:description: Purifying Dead Sea facial mud mask formulated to firm and boost cell renewal while hydrates and rejuvenates dull skin by lifting impurities and gently pulling out toxins from the skin. Leaves your skin fresh, supple with healthy looking complexion.

item.g:title: Facial Nourishing (Fruit)
item.g:description: An incredible mask designed to restore the skin’s moisture, tone and refine all skin types. Carefully selected combination of natural active ingredients: Papaya (Skin softener), Watermelon (Natural skin brightener), nourishing Grapefruit, Apple and Peach fruit extracts, blended with Jojoba and Avocado oils and Shea Butter which work synergistically with miraculous Dead Sea Minerals to rejuvenate and help repair sun-damaged and uneven skin, while tightening the skin, leaving it soft with glowing complexion. Get a silky and smooth feel.

item.g:title: Facial Nourishing (Herbal)
item.g:description: This new generation product formulated for combination skin, with multi-botanical extracts sage. Thyme and Aloe Vera mixed carefully with legendary therapeutic effect of world-famous Dead Sea Minerals, to gently help absorb excess oils, tone, and give powerful rejuvenating skin treatment. Infused with high effective Jojoba and Avocado oils combined with Shea butter to nourish & give healthy looking skin.Leaves your skin smooth and radiant.

item.g:title: Firming Cellulite
item.g:description: This cream contains natural active ingredients such as Ginger Root Extract, which localizes warming of the skin to increase blood circulation, while Guarana Seeds and Horsetail Extracts selectively fight and destroy cellulite deposits. With repeated use of Firming Cellulite Light Cream, your body becomes visibly firm and smooth.

item.g:title: Foot Cream
item.g:description: Unique, rich hydrating formula uses Almond Oil and other soothing moisturizers which protect feet against negative environmental influences. RivageFoot Cream rejuvenates with revitalizing Dead Sea Minerals and Natural antiseptic Tea Tree Oil, help repair sore, calloused feet and relieve dry, chapped heels and rough skin.

item.g:title: Glowing Peel Off Mask
item.g:description: This unique Peel Off Mask is carefully formulated from superb Black Dead Sea Mud combined with Chamomile and Aloe Vera exotic botanicals that act harmonically to remove dead skin cells and accumulated environmental impurities to rejuvenate and re-balance the skin in order to decrease skin sensitivity and enhance skin biosynthesis  process. Leaves your skin looking bright, refreshed with silky radiant complexion.

item.g:title: Hydra-Premium Body Moisturizer
item.g:description: Rivage Body Moisturizer Cream is a unique blend of the great moisturizer Glycerin combined with the most effective natural botanicals Avocado, Jojoba & Sweet Almond Oils while Proteins, Amino acids and essential matrix of vitamins A, E, D, and F along with Dead Sea Minerals are added to promote cell regeneration and provide the skin with ultimate softening effect. Leaves your body radiant, smooth with superb healthy look and hydrated complexion.

item.g:title: Intense Hair Repair Mask
item.g:description: Intense Hair Repair Mask is Ideal for color treated, bleached, or perm hair. Rich in vitamins, antioxidant and natural soothing botanicals along with Dead Sea Minerals to nourish, repair and moisturize your hair while providing the hair with the necessary proteins to seal hair cuticles, strengthen the hair roots and help reduce hair loss. Leaves hair soft with a healthy-looking shine.

item.g:title: Mineral Cleanser
item.g:description:
This fast-acting liquid cleanser gently cleanses while maintaining the delicate moisture balance of the skin. Daily impurities are washed away with rich Dead Sea Mineral water infused with natural plant extracts, leaving your skin feeling clean and refreshed.

recommended for maskne.

item.g:title: Mineral Soap
item.g:description: This refreshing soap washes away impurities and nourishes the skin with essential minerals from the Dead Sea. Light natural oils aid in restoring and maintaining the skin’s moisture balance, leaving it refreshed and hydrated.

item.g:title: Moisturizing Milk Body Lotion
item.g:description: Rivage Moisturizing Milk nourishes the skin and restores its elasticity with natural active ingredients like Vegetable Collagen, Vitamin E, Dead Sea Minerals and Aloe Vera. This light, non-oily lotion moisturizes and protects throughout the day, leaving the body soft and delicately scented.

item.g:title: Original Dead Sea Bath Salts - Natural-1k
item.g:description: The natural Dead Sea salt is rich in miraculous minerals that help sooth and rejuvenate your skin naturally. It calms irritated skin and eliminate skin problems. Sea salt helps relieve tired muscles and joints.

item.g:title: Original Dead Sea Bath Salts - Natural-250g
item.g:description: The natural Dead Sea salt is rich in miraculous minerals that help sooth and rejuvenate your skin naturally. It calms irritated skin and eliminate skin problems. Sea salt helps relieve tired muscles and joints.

item.g:title: Natural Scrub Salt
item.g:description: This Dead Sea Scrub is rich in miraculous minerals that naturally exfoliate your skin. Designed to be mixed with Rivage Massage Oil to instantly moisturize and revive your skin.

item.g:title: Night Cream
item.g:description: This moisturizing Night Cream dramatically enhances the look of your skin. Natural Avocado Oil significantly improves the skin’s elasticity while minimizing the appearance of fine wrinkles. This unique formula is enriched with revitalizing minerals from the Dead Sea, which rejuvenate the skin and stimulate the vital processes within the skin cells.

item.g:title: Night Cream
item.g:description: This luxurious Night Cream combines the moisturizing benefits of jojoba and paraffin oil, with Dead Sea minerals that quickly penetrate the skin and eliminate dryness. An exclusive blend of active natural extracts including jojoba, stops myriad skin problems and protects the skin against premature aging caused by exposure to ultra violet radiation. The Allantoin ingredient speeds up cell regeneration and has a keratolytic (skin-softening) effect.

item.g:title: Nourishing Body Mud Mask
item.g:description: Nourishing Dead Sea Body Mud Mask formulated from valuable ancient Dead Sea Black Mud which is rich with precious revitalizing minerals such as Magnesium, Potassium, Sulfates, Lithium, and others to remove dead skin cells, eliminate excess oils and enhance the reduction of fine lines appearance and wrinkles caused by aging and fatigue. Nourishing botanicals from Jojoba Oil, Avocado Oil and Papaya extract were added to boost cell renewal and revitalize the skin, while tightening pores. This Dead Sea Mud provides the essential elements to nourish, soothe and calm the skin leaving it fresh and purified with healthy body complexion.

item.g:title: Nourishing Facial Mud Mask
item.g:description: This unique Nourishing Mud Mask is formulated from valuable ancient Dead Sea Mud and natural Honey Extract to boost cell renewal and revitalize the skin, while tightening pores. As the mask dries, it gently sweeps away toxins and impurities known to clog pores and cause visible signs of aging. The presence of Dead Sea Mud infuses skin with needed curative minerals while firming it and improving elasticity. Natural Honey extracts provide the essential amino acids to nourish, soothe and calm the skin, leaving it looking fresh and purified with healthy renewed complexion.

item.g:title: Olive Oil Soap
item.g:description: Natural Olive Oil Soap with special formula enriched with Olive Oil and Vitamin E to nourish the skin giving it the necessary protection from the harmful environmental influences, leaving it extremely soft and clean. In addition to active Aloe Vera Oil and the Dead Sea Minerals that rejuvenate the skin leaving it smooth and invigorated.

item.g:title: Pregnancy Stretch Marks Cream
item.g:description: Rivage Pregnancy stretch marks cream helps the most advanced skin regeneration biosynthetic technology to repair skin tissue formation with dual action effect for both epidermal and dermal level. This Multi-Functional cream contains Marin Collagen, Calendula Oil and selective essential vitamins combined with most curative natural Dead Sea Minerals to provide superficial effect during pregnancy to reduce and remove pregnancy stretch marks by lightening the blemishes and regenerating the protein supplement process to help the skin’s renewal. Keeps your skin more elastic, smooth, with normal radiant and uniformed complexion.

item.g:title: Pro-Silk Shea Body Butter
item.g:description: Unique blend of great moisturizer Shea Butter combined with the most highly effective natural botanicals: Avocado, Jojoba, Sweet Almond Oils along with Proteins, Amino acids and essential matrix of vitamins A, E, D, and F to promote cell regeneration while moisturizing and healing the skin, with ultimate softening effect. Dead Sea Minerals were added to increase skin cells rejuvenating through rebuilding and biosynthesis process, leaving your body radiant, smooth and superb with healthy look and feel.

item.g:title: Aqua Shower Gel
item.g:description: RivageShower Gel is enriched with nourishing Dead Sea minerals and natural cleansing agents to create a luxurious aromatic experience in your daily shower or bath. This rich lather gently cleanses and moisturizes, leaving skin smooth and invigorated. After rinsing, a feeling of freshness and delicate fragrance remains throughout the day.

item.g:title: Fruity Shower Gel
item.g:description: Rivage Shower Gel is enriched with nourishing Dead Sea minerals and natural cleansing agents to create a luxurious aromatic experience in your daily shower or bath. This rich lather gently cleanses and moisturizes, leaving skin smooth and invigorated. After rinsing, a feeling of freshness and delicate fragrance remains throughout the day.

item.g:title: Slimming Body Mud
item.g:description: An effective Dead Sea Mud combined with natural Anti-Cellulite Extracts including Gaurana, Horsetail and Caffeine, which are designed to improve the appearance of the skin while reducing orange skin and cellulite. Very gentle stimulation that enhances cellulite reduction, better blood circulation and skin toning. Makes your body firm with healthy shape.

item.g:title: Whitening Lotion
item.g:description: This unique lotion tones and tightens pores while concealing dark marks and hyper-pigmentation on the skin. It promotes even and light skin pigmentation with natural Bearberry Extracts. The natural active ingredients work deep beneath the skin’s surface to produce a more uniform complexion by decreasing the production of melanin in the skin cells. Repeated use of this product maintains your skin’s lightness and youthful appearance.

item.g:title: Foot Scrub
item.g:description: An intensive unique formula designed carefully from natural Castor Oil with the most curative Dead Sea Crystals–instant Carnalite, combined carefully with active anti-septic Triclosan working synergistically to scrub your foot skin mildly and get rid of bacteria and fungus causing bad feet odor. Enhancedwith Vitamin E to rejuvenate and boost cell metabolism, while removing dead skin cells and impurities. Leaves your feet skin healthier, smoother with refreshing order.

item.g:title: Refreshing Shower Gel
item.g:description: Rivage Shower Gel is enriched with nourishing Dead Sea minerals and natural cleansing agents to create a luxurious aromatic experience in your daily shower or bath. This rich lather gently cleanses and moisturizes, leaving skin refreshed and invigorated. After rinsing, a feeling of freshness and delicate fragrance remains throughout the day.

item.g:title: Mineral Toner
item.g:description: Rivage Mineral Toner is alcohol-free and specially formulated with rich minerals and botanicals to regenerate the skin. It is rich with pro-vitamin B5 and various plants extracts such as fennel, balm mint, mistletoe and chamomile. These natural active ingredients, combined with Dead Sea minerals and succharides with amino acids, provide your skin with a refreshing toner that prepares the skin before and after facial treatments.

item.g:title: Facial Wash
item.g:description: A gentle cleansing gel that effectively removes dirt and impurities, without upsetting the skin’s surface; retains the moisture balance by using the most effective nourishing vitamin E and Pro–vitamin B5, immersed with ultimate curative Dead Sea Minerals, to help cell’s rejuvenation and stimulation.

item.g:title: Skin Correcting Serum
item.g:description: Rivage Skin Correcting Serum is designed with high-potency of Collagen, Vitamin C & Pro-Vitamin B5, improved and fortified by a complex of fruit acids and Aloe and Chamomile extracts, act together effectively to stimulate and energize the skin cellular production. This oily-free natural cellular replenishment serum is quickly absorbed to repair sun-damaged and aged skin. Leaves it more tightened, fades sun, age spots and restores skin texture to give a healthy youthful silky complexion.

item.g:title: Natural Mineral Shampoo
item.g:description: Rivage Natural Mineral Shampoo for all hair types gives your hair and scalp the ultimate care and protection needed, in order to restore your hair balance, radiate shiny hair and ensure healthy growth.

item.g:title: AHA Retexturizing Skin Cream
item.g:description: Rivage AHA Retexturizing Skin Cream formulated from high effective Multi Natural AlphaHydroxy Acids to instantly remove away impurities and dead skin cells and to leave skin feeling perfectly clean, smooth and soft. Continuous use helps speed up the skin’s natural renewal rate resulting in minimizing the appearance of surface lines and provide cellular retexturizing perfectly, younger velvety looking is gained. It is also enriched with essential minerals from the Dead Sea and Allantoin for healing, soothing and intensive skin nourishment. Leaving skin healthy with an amazing boost of firmness and youthfulness.

item.g:description: Purifying Dead Sea facial mud mask formulated to firm and boost cell renewal while hydrates and rejuvenates dull skin by lifting impurities and gently pulling out toxins from the skin. Leaves your skin fresh, supple with healthy looking complexion.

Works to inhibit pigmentation, decrease spots caused by sun-exposure and aging factors, in addition to tone the color difference. Leaves your skin more clarified, youthful-looking with bright texture and homogeneous color tone.

Reduces muscle tension, leaves your body rejuvenated through increasing blood circulation, revealing a healthy-glowing fresh body.</p>

This amazing mask will retain to you a natural, smooth, velvety and clear complexion skin.

item.g:title: High-Protection Sun Cream
item.g:description: RIVAGE protective sunscreen cream SPF 30 provides a broad–spectrum sun protection that protects your skin against both UVA & UVB harmful rays in order to prevent sun burn, discoloration and premature aging, It keeps the skin moist, soft and smooth while shielding from the sun even during strenuous activities.

item.g:title: Sun Protection Cream Ultra Defence
item.g:description: A Powerful sun protection cream SPF 45 is designed to protect against aging, dark spots and promote healthy skin. Multifunctional sunscreen agents combined with special advanced water resistant factor to provide high protection against the sun harmful UVA & UVB rays under superior coverage for prolonged exposure. It retains the skin's natural moisture barrier with selective moisturizers. It Keeps your skin supple and protected complexion.

item.g:title: Total Sun Protection Lotion
item.g:description: RIVAGE Sun Block Lotion contains a unique blend of natural Dead Sea Minerals, Vitamin E and natural Zinc Oxide, to provide a broad spectrum of coverage and protection against UV-B and UV-A sun exposure. This formula has an active mix of sun filters to protect against sunburn and other physiological effects of sun damage to the skin.

item.g:title: After Sun Balm Ultra Cooling
item.g:description: An ultimate After Sun beauty care, effectively helps reduce redness and prevent the skin from excessive peeling caused by cumulative sun damage. This replenishing formula 100% natural Jojoba oil and Aloe Vera Extract, combined with multi-curative complex of provitamin B5, Vitamin E and Bisabolol, is designed to help repair the damage from sun exposure and restore skin moisture balance and help to eliminate irritation and premature signs of aging. Leaves skin feeling perfectly comfortable and smooth.

item.g:title: Dead Sea Moisturizing Mud Mask Sachets
item.g:description:
Dead Sea Facial Moisturizing Mud Mask rich with Jojoba & Olive oil. A moisturizing Dead Sea mud mask that regenerates your skin and provides an ultimate skin hydration. Rivage Moisturizing mud mask is enriched with a unique blend of natural Dead Sea mud and hydrating plant extracts. Natural Dead Sea mud helps cleanse impurities and exfoliate your skin’s outer layer, while Olive oil helps protect and balances your skin moisture. Jojoba is a natural emollient that hydrates and enhances your skin elasticity. Your skin instantly becomes soft, smooth and supple.

Note: Each Pack Contains 4 Identical Sachets (25g X 4)

Your skin becomes radiant, calm and soft.

item.g:description: Extra strong Deep Hair Nourishing Mask for all hair types. Ideal for any damaged, dull or color-treated, perm hair. An advanced nourishing formula rich in vitamins; Pro-Vitamin B5 & antioxidant Vitamin E and natural soothing botanicals Aloe Vera & Shea Butter along with Dead Sea Minerals to nourish, repair, and moisturize your hair while strengthening the hair roots to lessen the hair loss. item.g:description: A gentle cleansing gel that effectively removes dirt and impurities, without upsetting the skin’s surface; retains the moisture balance by using the most effective nourishing vitamin E and Pro–vitamin B5, immersed with ultimate curative Natural Dead Sea Minerals, to help cell’s rejuvenation and stimulation.

item.g:title: Mineral Moisture
item.g:description:
The ultimate daily skin hydrating routine, this gift set from Rivage contains the following:

Facial Moisturizing Cream 60 ml

Rivage Facial Moisturizing Cream with Vegetable Collagen helps eliminate the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while providing hours of hydrating coverage. This remarkable formula combined with Vitamin E, Pro-Vitamin B5, Dead Sea Minerals and Aloe Vera to protect and replenish the skin’s elasticity and natural moisture balance, while maintaining the skin’s natural tone and smoothness.

 

Natural Soap Enriched with Olive Oil & Vitamin E 120 g

Natural Olive Oil Soap with a special formula enriched with Olive Oil and Vitamin E to nourish the skin giving it the necessary protection from the harmful environmental influences, leaving it extremely soft and clean. In addition to active Aloe Vera Oil and the Dead Sea Minerals that rejuvenate the skin leaving it smooth and invigorated 

Eye Cream 20 ml

 Rivage Eye Cream is a revolutionary treatment product that helps reduce puffiness and dark circles and eliminate fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes. It contains the moisturizing benefits of Jojoba Oil, Avocado Oil, and Natural Dead Sea Minerals to help revitalize the elasticity of skin surrounding the eyes, and Beech Tree Bud Extract helps eliminate wrinkles and signs of premature aging.  A special mineral foundation is added to conceal dark circles or uneven skin tone.

item.g:title: Mineral Cleansing Essentials.
item.g:description:
The ultimate gift especially formulated to cleanse and tone your skin, the set contains the following:

Mineral Cleanser 200 ml

Rivage Mineral Cleanser is a fast-acting liquid cleanser gently cleanses while maintaining the delicate moisture balance of the skin and helps sweeps away impurities with it's rich Dead Sea Mineral water infused with natural plant extracts, leaving your skin feeling clean and refreshed.

Mineral Toner Alcohol-Free 200 ml

Rivage Mineral Toner is alcohol-free and specially formulated with rich Dead Sea Minerals and botanicals to regenerate the skin. It is rich with pro-vitamin B5 and various plant extracts such as fennel, balm mint, mistletoe, and chamomile. These natural active ingredients, combined with Dead Sea minerals and succharides with amino acids, provide your skin with a refreshing toner that prepares the skin before and after facial treatments

item.g:title: Revitalize Day & Night
item.g:description:
Rivage day and night treatment work together to maintain healthy and radiant looking skin, this gift contains the following:

Day Cream for Normal Skin Rich in Vitamin E - SPF 15 50 ml

A restorative day cream from Rivage utilizing Dead Sea minerals, Aloe Vera extract, Vitamin E, and active sunscreen agents to provide your skin with an enhancing balance of moisture and nourishment, helping to prevent premature skin from damage as a result of harmful UVA and UVB sun exposure. Promotes a more youthful and revitalized complexion.

 

Revitalizing Night Cream 50 ml

Rivage Revitalizing Cream is non-greasy and easily absorbs instantly. The skin is transformed from beneath the surface, and moisture lost due to environmental influences is completely restored. Skin is smooth, visibly revitalized, more radiant and youthful complexion is revealed.

item.g:title: Dead Sea Soap Trio
item.g:description:
A trio gift set of Rivage Dead Sea soap collection, the gift contains:

Mineral Soap 100 g

This refreshing Dead Sea Soap from Rivage washes away impurities and nourishes the skin with essential minerals from the Dead Sea. Light natural oils aid in restoring and maintaining the skin’s moisture balance, leaving it refreshed and hydrated.

 

Black Mud Soap 100 g 

This luxurious black mud soap from Rivage cleanses and nourishes the skin, infusing it with revitalizing Dead Sea Minerals and restoring the skin’s pH balance for maximum benefits.  Dead Sea Mud, combined with Glycerin, works to remove impurities without stripping moisture from the skin.

 

Exfoliant Soap 100 g

This luxurious soap bar gently exfoliates and moisturizes the skin using a combination of natural active ingredients. Walnut shell granules remove dead cells and polish the surface of the skin while Dead Sea Minerals penetrate and revitalize the skin. Moisturizing elements seal in moisture, giving your skin the protection it needs.

item.g:title: Soft Hand & Feet
item.g:description:
A pampering collection gives your hands and feet the ultimate moisturizing & protection for a softer and smoother feeling.  

The set contains the following:

Emollient Hand Cream 100 ml

Intensive humectants combined with Shea Butter and revitalizing Dead Sea Minerals to help reduce excessive perspiration and skin roughness due to external aggressions while restores skin firmness, moisture, and elasticity. Leaves your hands smooth, supple with a silky touch.

Foot Cream 100 ml

A Unique, rich hydrating formula uses Almond Oil and other soothing moisturizers which protect feet against negative environmental influences. Rivage Foot Cream rejuvenates with revitalizing Dead Sea Minerals and Natural Antiseptic Tea Tree Oil, help repair sore, calloused feet and relieve dry, chapped heels and rough skin

This remarkable formula combined with Vitamin E, Pro-Vitamin B5, Dead Sea Minerals and Aloe Vera to protect and replenish the skin’s elasticity and natural moisture balance, while maintaining the skin’s natural tone and smoothness

 

Exfoliant Soap 100 g

This luxurious soap bar gently exfoliates and moisturizes the skin using a combination of natural active ingredients. Walnut shell granules remove dead cells and polish the surface of the skin while Dead Sea Minerals penetrate and revitalize the skin.
